name: 1930,s Horror Prototype
description: this game was a prototype made in 6 weeks for my past, present, future project for my college course. it doesn't have much of a story as I was mostly focusing on the atmosphere and the map design. it is a very short game with a playthrough taking on average about 3-5 minutes. this game is set in the 1930s in a Nazi insane asylum where the Nazis are doing experiments on unwilling victims. if you think there is anything I could have done better please put it in the comments.
